page.title: 02EDUCATION IN S.HARRIS
page.content: Our school is {LEVERHULME MEMORIAL which was built by Lord Leverhulme who is metioned in our introduction. There are {56}pupils_ages ranging from 5 to 14.There are two sections_ {PRIMARY}_ages 5 to 11.{SECONDARY}_ages 12 to 14. {PRIMARY},37pupils,2permanent teachers. {SUBJECTS}_English,Gaelic,Maths,History Geography. Music,French(11 year olds),Physical Education and Art are taught by visiting teachers. {SECONDARY}_19 pupils. {SUBJECTS}_ Maths,English,Gaelic,French Science,Geography,History,Art,Music, Physical Education,Home Economics, Technical Education. Religious Education is taught in both Primany and Secondary departments.
